remarks: Approximate version of ~ itg1le .  If ` F <_ G ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S.1 F <_ S.1 G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itg10a.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. dom S.1 ) $.
itg10a.2 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
itg10a.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` A ) = 0 ) $.
itg1lea.4 $e |- ( ph -> G e. dom S.1 ) $.
itg1lea.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( RR \ A ) ) -> ( F ` x ) <_ ( G ` x ) ) $.
itg1lea $p |- ( ph -> ( S.1 ` F ) <_ ( S.1 ` G ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d ph x $.
